item.title: 鲍威尔重申美联储等待关税明朗化，不急于降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将向立法者重申，央行并不急于降息，因为官员们正在等待总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税对经济影响的进一步明朗化。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will reiterate to lawmakers the central bank is in no rush to lower interest rates as officials wait for more clarity on the economic impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称石油波动不会阻碍通胀回落
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，以色列和伊朗之间的战争导致商品价格近期出现波动，但这并不会改变欧元区的通胀前景。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said recent swings in commodities prices due to the war between Israel and Iran don’t change the outlook for inflation in the euro zone.】

item.title: 加拿大 5 月通胀率维持在 1.7%，核心压力降温
item.description: 加拿大消费者物价保持稳定，而基本核心指标有所放缓，这可能会让加拿大央行的政策制定者稍感宽慰，因为他们曾对近几个月基本通胀数据升温表示担忧。【原文：Canadian consumer prices held steady while underlying core measures eased, likely giving some relief to Bank of Canada policymakers who had raised concerns about hotter underlying inflation prints in recent months.】

item.title: 巴西央行称提高利率的影响尚未到来
item.description: 巴西央行表示将暂停加息周期，以观察紧缩货币政策对高于目标的通胀率的影响，并强调很大一部分影响还在后头。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it will pause its interest rate hiking cycle to observe the effects of tighter monetary policy on above-target inflation, emphasizing that a great part of the impact is still to come.】

item.title: PGIM 在新任首席执行官的改革中打造价值 1 万亿美元的信贷部门
item.description: 作为新任首席执行官 Jacques Chappuis 重启计划的一部分，PGIM 公司将合并其公共固定收益团队和私人信贷团队，创建一个拥有近 1 万亿美元资产的部门。【原文：PGIM, Inc. is merging its public fixed-income and private-credit teams to create a unit with almost $1 trillion of assets as part of new Chief Executive Officer Jacques Chappuis’s reboot plan.】

item.title: 匈牙利保持基准利率稳定以抑制通胀
item.description: 匈牙利中央银行连续第九个月维持关键利率不变，在地缘政治风险和持续高通胀预期的情况下保持稳定。【原文：Hungary’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a ninth month, holding steady amid geopolitical risks and persistently high inflation expectations.】

item.title: 桥点公司将在数周内向投资者返还 20 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在私募股权投资回报日益受到关注之际，桥点集团（Bridgepoint Group Plc）正计划在未来几周内向其一只旗舰基金的投资者返还约 20 亿欧元（约合 23 亿美元）。【原文：Bridgepoint Group Plc is planning to return about €2 billion ($2.3 billion) to investors in one of its flagship funds over the next couple weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, at a time of increased focus on private equity returns.】

item.title: 印度储备银行在数月注资后将限制短期银行现金
item.description: 印度中央银行宣布了一项从银行系统中抽走短期流动性的计划，这标志着该银行在连续数月注入现金帮助降低借贷成本之后转变了做法。【原文：India’s central bank announced a plan to drain short-term liquidity from the banking system, signaling a shift in its approach after months of cash infusions that helped push down borrowing costs.】

item.title: 西班牙对 BBVA 160 亿美元收购萨瓦德尔银行设置更多障碍
item.description: 西班牙政府对 BBVA SA 收购萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的计划施加了附加条件，使这项价值 140 亿欧元（160 亿美元）的交易在提出一年多后再次受挫。【原文：Spain’s government imposed additional conditions on BBVA SA’s planned takeover of Banco Sabadell SA, in another setback to the €14 billion ($16 billion) deal more than a year after it was first proposed.】

item.description: 据晨星公司（Morningstar Inc.【原文：Wealthy retail investors in the US piling into private credit are pushing the market for semi-liquid funds to about $350 billion and exposing themselves to new risks, according to a Morningstar Inc. report.】

item.title: 汇丰银行调查显示，投资者对新兴市场的看好程度为两年来最高
item.description: 根据汇丰银行对 100 位基金经理的季度调查，投资者对新兴市场的看好程度达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Investors’ bullishness on emerging markets is at its highest in over two years, according to HSBC’s quarterly survey of 100 money managers.】

item.title: StanChart 计划将 SRT 与 20 亿美元的公司贷款挂钩
item.description: 据知情人士透露，渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）计划将价值约 20 亿美元的企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc plans a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of corporate loans worth about $2 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 在线求职公司 CareerBuilder + Monster 申请破产
item.description: Careerbuilder + Monster 是一家汇集了早期在线职位招聘先驱的公司，由于业务持续萎缩，该公司于本周二在特拉华州申请破产保护。【原文：Careerbuilder + Monster, a firm that brought together early trailblazers in online job recruiting, filed for bankruptcy protection in Delaware on Tuesday as business continues to shrivel.】

item.title: 莱坊称孟买住房价格为 15 年来最低
item.description: 一家房地产咨询公司的报告称，孟买的购房负担能力创下了 15 年来的新高，因为央行最近下调了利率，降低了抵押贷款成本。【原文：House purchase affordability in Mumbai hit a 15-year high following the central bank’s recent rate cuts that reduce mortgage costs, a property consultant’s report said.】

item.title: 太平洋地平线上前往美国的集装箱船数量增加
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁提高全球关税之前，企业竞相囤积货物，因此美国最繁忙的海运中心在未来几周内集装箱货运量有望增加。但目前还不清楚这将是进口潮还是仅仅是涟漪。【原文：The busiest US maritime complex looks to get an increase in container cargo in the next couple weeks as businesses race to stockpile ahead of global tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to increase. But whether it’ll be an import wave or merely a ripple is unclear.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林警告英国通胀率上升可能成为棘手问题
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）警告说，第二轮效应可能会使通胀率在更长时间内保持在3%以上，但她表示，这不应妨碍央行继续逐步降息。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene warned second-round effects may keep inflation above 3% for longer but said it should not prevent the central bank from pressing on with gradual interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 毛里求斯寻求浮动电站供应以避免停电
item.description: 毛里求斯正在寻求国际竞标，利用重油浮动发电厂供电，以提高产能，避免停电。【原文：Mauritius is seeking international bids to supply electricity from a floating plant using heavy fuel oil to bolster capacity and avoid blackouts.】

item.title: 据说 MMC 港口将申请 2012 年以来马来西亚最大的 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MMC Port Holdings Sdn.公司正在推进其在马来西亚上市的计划，这可能是吉隆坡十多年来最大的一次首次公开募股。【原文：MMC Port Holdings Sdn. is pressing ahead with its planned listing in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be the biggest initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur in more than a decade.】

item.title: 在无人驾驶竞赛中，Alphabet 的股价不及特斯拉
item.description: 投资者对无人驾驶汽车的热情高涨，但 Alphabet 公司的股价却没有反映出这种兴奋情绪。【原文：There’s a lot of investor excitement about driverless cars, yet Alphabet Inc.’s shares reflect little of that euphoria — even as its Waymo robotaxis proliferate in major US cities.】

item.title: 地缘政治未能破坏美股涨势，美股向创纪录目标迈进
item.description: 中东地区的停火大大降低了能源价格受到重大干扰的可能性，股市正朝着蓝天白云的方向发展。【原文：Equities are headed for a blue-sky scenario after the ceasefire in the Middle East drastically reduced the odds of a major disruption to energy prices.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发的裁员波及整个汽车零部件行业

item.title: BCG称瑞士财富流失速度快于亚洲竞争对手
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的一份报告显示，瑞士作为世界顶级财富管理中心的地位正面临来自亚洲竞争对手的更严峻挑战。【原文：Switzerland is facing a stiffer challenge to its position as the world’s top wealth management center from Asian rivals, according to a Boston Consulting Group report.】
